page.title: 13TEACHERS STRIKES
page.content: My name is Amanda Williams and I live in the village of{Bishopston.}I go to{Bishopston Comprehensive School} but my friends and I have a lot of time off school lately because of teachers' strikes. I am 15 and in the final year at{Bishopston.}When I leave school I hope to go to study art. We live in a world of {videos}and{laser- {beams, hifis}and{space shuttles.}I am not looking forward to my O-levels in the summer, I blame it all on the teachers! {Bishopston}has become quite a built up area in the last few years, although there are not many places where people around my age group are able to go out and enjoy ourselves. We hear a lot ofmurder in the news and it is very rarely that we hear any good news. It is all war and murder. AMANDA WILLIAMS 5P
